procedures.title: Unpacking and Initial Setup
steps: Carefully open the packaging box.
Remove all protective materials from the ZEN 150 unit.
Inspect the unit for any visible damage.
Check that all accessories and documentation are included as per the packing list.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 and all accessories are unpacked, undamaged, and ready for installation.

procedures.title: Countertop Placement and Electrical Connection
preconditions: ZEN 150 unit fully unpacked and inspected
Countertop surface is clean, level, and stable
Designated power supply (48 V DC) is available
steps: Place the ZEN 150 on the designated countertop.
Ensure the unit is stable and level.
Connect the power cable to the 48 V DC power supply port.
Ensure the power connection is secure and the cable is not pinched.
Turn on the power switch, if present.
Wait for the touchscreen to initialize.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 is securely placed and correctly connected to the power supply, ready for use.

procedures.title: Starting the ZEN 150 - Normal Operating Mode
preconditions: ZEN 150 is installed and powered on
steps: Touch the power icon on the screen.
Wait for the system self-check to complete.
Navigate to the main functional menu.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 is operational in normal mode and ready for user commands.

procedures.title: Activating Safety Lock Feature
preconditions: ZEN 150 is powered on and operational
steps: Touch the settings icon on the touchscreen.
Select 'Safety Lock'.
Confirm activation when prompted.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 enters safety lock mode, disabling unauthorized operations.

procedures.title: Deactivating Safety Lock Feature
preconditions: ZEN 150 is in safety lock mode
steps: Touch the settings icon on the screen.
Select 'Safety Lock'.
Enter authorized user PIN or passcode.
Confirm to deactivate safety lock.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 exits safety lock mode and normal operations resume.

procedures.title: Routine Cleaning and Maintenance
preconditions: ZEN 150 is turned off and unplugged
steps: Wipe the exterior surfaces using a soft, damp cloth.
Clean the touchscreen with an approved screen cleaner.
Check all vents and openings for dust, removing buildup with compressed air if necessary.
Inspect the power cable for any visible damage.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 is clean and free of dust or residue; device is maintained for optimal performance.

procedures.title: Error Code E01 - Power Supply Fault
steps: Check the power connection.
Ensure the power supply provides the correct 48 V DC.
Inspect the power cable for damage.
Reset the device after resolving any issues.
procedures.expected_outcome: Power supply is restored, and ZEN 150 operates normally.

procedures.title: Error Code E02 - Touchscreen Not Responding
steps: Power off the device.
Check touchscreen connections at rear panel.
Ensure no external substances are contaminating the screen.
Restart the device.
procedures.expected_outcome: Touchscreen responds to user input and normal operation resumes.

procedures.title: Error Code E10 - System Self-Check Failure
preconditions: ZEN 150 displays E10 during startup sequence
steps: Note the exact error description on the display.
Restart the device to repeat self-check.
If the error persists, contact technical support.
procedures.expected_outcome: System passes self-check and proceeds to main menu, or issue escalated for service.

procedures.title: Error Code E20 - Safety Lock Deactivation Failure
preconditions: ZEN 150 displays E20 when attempting to unlock Safety Lock mode
steps: Verify that the correct PIN or passcode was entered.
Wait 30 seconds and retry unlocking.
If error persists, use master unlock procedure or contact support.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 exits safety lock mode, or alternate unlocking procedure is initiated.
